title: The Best of Both Worlds!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Lanzhu-chan, are you enjoying life in the dorms?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s great to hear. I’d like to experience that too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Don’t you kinda live like you’re in a dorm too? I mean, you can talk to Chika on the balcony, right? That’s what she told me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, that’s true. Chika-chan is my next-door neighbor, and our rooms are right next to each other.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I’m so jealous of that too! We can’t talk on the balcony in the dorms.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yes! When I’m about to sleep and suddenly have an idea for a live performance, I want someone to hear me out right away. You can do that with Chika, can’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmm... I guess it’s easier to discuss things like that. Though we do send messages to each other before we go outside to talk.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Being neighbors is just as great as dorm life, huh! How awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
